Background: An opera singer and an artist, Selena was born in Babylonia and received aristocrat-style education. Her beautiful voice and musical talents once made her the most anticipated rising star in the World Government Association of Art in Babylonia. Later, she underwent construct adaptation surgery, becoming a soldier, but was declared MIA after a disastrous battle at the International Space Station. Selena, saved by an agent, underwent a long journey on Earth to retrieve her own memories. At the end of her journey, she was finally able to find herself and returned to Babylonia with the Gray Raven Commandant.
